es.iver.derivedGeom.utils
Class StringUtilitiesExtended

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.utiles.StringUtilities
      es.iver.derivedGeom.utils.StringUtilitiesExtended

public class StringUtilitiesExtended
extends com.iver.utiles.StringUtilities

Extends StringUtilities for adding support to replace some problematic letters to their most equivalent.

Author:
Pablo Piqueras Bartolomé (pablo.piqueras@iver.es)

Constructor Detail

StringUtilitiesExtended

public StringUtilitiesExtended()
Method Detail

replaceAllAccents

public static java.lang.String replaceAllAccents(java.lang.String s)

Replaces all letters with accent by their equivalent without it:

  • à,á,â,ä by a
  • è,é,ê,ë by e
  • ì,í,î,ï by i
  • ò,ó,ô,ö by o
  • ù,ú,û,ü by u
  • À,Á,Â,Ä by A
  • È,É,Ê,Ë by E
  • Ì,Í,Î,Ï by I
  • Ò,Ó,Ô,Ö by O
  • Ù,Ú,Û,Ü by U

Parameters:
s - text to be formatted
Returns:
text formatted

replaceAllCedilla

public static java.lang.String replaceAllCedilla(java.lang.String s)

Replaces all cedilla letters by the letter c:

  • ç by c
  • Ç by C

Parameters:
s - text to be formatted
Returns:
text formatted

replaceAllNWithTilde

public static java.lang.String replaceAllNWithTilde(java.lang.String s)

Replaces all n with tilde letters by n:

  • ñ by n
  • Ñ by N

Parameters:
s - text to be formatted
Returns:
text formatted
